summary: Implemented spec 04-wallet-context.md - created WalletContext, all 8 custom hooks, and 3 wallet components. All 111 tests pass and TypeScript compiles without errors.
decisions: Only exported hooks from spec 04 (useWallet, useWalletActions, useNWCClient, useBalance, useInvoice, usePayment, useBudget, useFiatRate) - excluded useTransactionLog, useLightningAddressPayment, useNotifications, useZap which are from later specs
Added data-testid attributes to all interactive wallet components for E2E testing
Created wallet components barrel export index.ts for cleaner imports
Used combined hook pattern in tests to ensure shared context state between useWallet and useWalletActions
